title: Ron Paul on The Daily Show
author: VD
content_html: Once again, an excellent performance by Dr. Paul. It was almost flawless, as the only thing he missed was to point out, in answer to one of Stewart’s questions, that corporations are government entities created by governments. I just received my copy of End the Fed from his publisher and will be reviewing it soon.
content_text:
Once again, an excellent performance by Dr. Paul.  It was almost flawless, as the only thing he missed was to point out, in answer to one of Stewart’s questions, that
corporations are government entities created by governments.
I just received my copy of
End the Fed
from his publisher and will be reviewing it soon.
